attributes.action: Appoint recently retired detective Clive Driscoll to lead child abuse inquiry.
attributes.additional_details: Having listened to him and about him, he might be the only honest policeman to come out of the Met in 30 years.  Do not waste his talents - he already knows about politicians involved in child abuse in Lambeth in the 1980s - so he knows what they look like, what they smell like and who they are.  PUT HIM IN CHARGE.
